E-Mail Messages
Date: Sunday, 4/13/1990
Subject: Trade offer
Dear Sir,
I would like to offer you following trade:
1B Benny Hernandez
in return for
MR Michael Taylor, SP Lincoln Ware.

Please let me know if you accept!

Best Regards,
Ashburn GM



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Everette Rogers
Dear Sir,
Everette Rogers has an ERA of 2.97 at A Longmont Storm!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Michael Nolan
Dear Sir,
Michael Nolan has nothing more to prove at A Longmont Storm!
He has an AVG of .328 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Steven Atchley
Dear Sir,
Steven Atchley has an AVG of .407 at A Longmont Storm!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Carmen Ronzonni
Dear Sir,
Carmen Ronzonni has nothing more to prove at A Longmont Storm!
He has an ERA of 1.67 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Tony Yunque
Dear Sir,
Tony Yunque is doing pretty good at A Longmont Storm!
He has an ERA of 1.45, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 5/7/1990
Subject: Progress of Blas Porcaro
Dear Sir,
Blas Porcaro has nothing more to prove at A Longmont Storm!
He has an ERA of 3.86 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 5/7/1990
Subject: Status of Bennett Estrada
Dear Sir,
Bennett Estrada isn't hitting the ball at all at AA St. Paul Saint!
He has an AVG of .241, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Sunday, 5/18/1990
Subject: Status of Richard Court
Dear Sir,
Richard Court has an AVG of .249 at AA St. Paul Saint!
That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Sunday, 5/18/1990
Subject: Status of Jason Pratt
Dear Sir,
Jason Pratt shouldn't play at AA St. Paul Saint!
He has an AVG of .247 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director
